feed.subtitle: This page is created to share my CV, my interests and other technical info with anyone from the tech community.

entry.title: Linux persmissions fix script
entry.content:
Here is a simple script to transfer the permissions in unix filesystem from a source path to a destination path in order to be identical.

Check the source code here https://github.com/0x66616e6973/bash_tools/blob/main/fixPermissions.sh
entry.summary: Here is a simple script to transfer the permissions in unix filesystem from a source path to a destination path in order to be identical.
